entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
